channel.title: How do i make ::master and ::pure?
channel.description: I've been looking at my commands list and not one of them is master or pure.. plz help.. tell me how to make those type of commands(types that alternate skills)

item.title: How do i make ::master and ::pure?
item.dc:creator: @server868 server868
item.description:
@server868 wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:2, topic:374897”] if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { addSkillXP(14000000, i); } 

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 1) {
            addSkillXP(14000000, 0); 
            addSkillXP(0, 1); 
            addSkillXP(14000000, 2); 
            addSkillXP(14000000, 3); 
            addSkillXP(14000000, 4); 
            addSkillXP(0, 5); 
            addSkillXP(14000000, 6);  
        }

They’re for deltascape, you weren’t very specific.[/quote]

^ you can do that or add each exp separately like in the pure command just all the way through 21 or 22

Read full topic

item.title: How do i make ::master and ::pure?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) {
for(int i = 0; i < 21; i++) {
addSkillXP(14000000, i);
}
if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pure") && playerRights >= 1) {
            addSkillXP(14000000, 0);  // this adds xp
            addSkillXP(0, 1); 
            addSkillXP(14000000, 2); 
            addSkillXP(14000000, 3); 
            addSkillXP(14000000, 4); 
            addSkillXP(0, 5); 
            addSkillXP(14000000, 6);  
        }

They’re for deltascape, you weren’t very specific. It’s very simple,

addSkillXP(AMOUNT, SKILLID);

Read full topic
